results.name: Scott Summers
results.description: He is one of the founding members of the X-Men.

results.name: Logan
results.description: He is a member of the X-Men. He has a mysterious and confused past

results.name: Charles Xavier
results.description: He is a powerful telepathic mutant and leader of the X-Men

results.name: Ororo Munroe
results.description: She is a mutant and member of the X-Men. She comes from Africa. She would also be leader of the Morlocks for a long time

results.name: Jean Grey
results.description: He is one of the original members of the X-Men. While working as a member of the group, Jean developed romantic feelings for Scott Summers and found herself the center of attention to Wolverine as well.

results.name: Dr. Hank McCoy
results.description: He is one of the original members of the X-Men. He has been with the team throughout its history. He has extensive knowledge in chemistry and biology, whose own research was used to nearly destroy mutantkind. He has also been a member of the Avengers

results.name: Rogue
results.description: She is a mutant and a member of the X-Men

results.name: Remy LeBeau
results.description: He is a mutant and a member of the X-Men and formerly a member of the Thieves' Guild

results.name: Jubilation Lee
results.description: She is a mutant and a member of the X-Men.

results.name: Kevin Sydney
results.description: He is a mutant and member of the X-Men

results.name: Erik Magnus Lehnsherr
results.description: He is a revolutionary leader who believes mutants are the next stage of evolution for humanity and are destined to take over the world. He is a friend and enemy to Professor Charles Xavier. He is often an adversary of, though sometimes an ally to, the X-Men.

results.name: Graydon Creed, Sr.
results.description: He is a mutant supervillain. He is a former member of Team X and is the archenemy to Wolverine

results.name: Cain Marko
results.description: He is the step-brother to Charles Xavier. He used a mystical gem to become the unstoppable Juggernaut

results.name: Bolivar Trask
results.description: He is the man who designed the Sentinels

results.name: Nathan Christopher Charles Summers
results.description: He is a time traveling mutant, mercenary, and leader of X-Force. He spends much of his time trying to take down the evil mutant Apocalypse in the year 3999 AD

results.name: Robert Kelly
results.description: Kelly served as a Senator and later as President

results.name: Raven Darkholme
results.description: She is a shapeshifting mutant. She is the leader of the Brotherhood of Mutants.

results.name: Graydon Creed Jr.
results.description: He is the son of Sabretooth and Mystique. He was the leader of the anti-mutant hate group Friends of Humanity.

results.name: En Sabah Nur
results.description: He is an extremely powerful and ancient mutant. His ultimate goal is to rule the entire planet.

results.name: Lucas Bishop
results.description: He is a mutant from the future of New York in 2055 AD. He became a time traveller in order to make his present a better place
